title: FS: t206 HOFers, consolidated list - Offers Welcome
author: trobba

posts.post_title: FS: t206 HOFers, consolidated list - Offers Welcome
posts.post_content:
Following is a list of cards and asking prices I have previously posted...

at this time I am accepting offers

I believe I am pretty reasonable so feel free to make an offer on any cards you are interested in. Email preferred...I don't want to clog up the thread, so scans are on the original links, but happy to send any you might want to an email address.

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

Evers, blus sky - PSA 3 - $275 SOLD
Chance, red port - PSA 3 - $400 SOLD
Lajoie, throw - PSA 3 mc - $385  SOLD
Mathewson, white cap, Sovereign 150 - PSA 2.5 - $1200  SOLD
Young, bare hand, PSA Authentic - $525  SOLD
Young, portrait - PSA 3.5 - $2200  SOLD
Johnson, Portrait,, EPDG - PSA 3 - $4200 SOLD
Cobb, bat on - PSA 2 mk - $1850
Cobb, green portrait - PSA 3 - $8400 SOLD
